turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about The Terror Tapes.
turn.1: What is meant by The Terror Tapes?
turn.2: The Terror Tapes The Terror Tapes is fourth studio album by Irish thrash metal band Gama Bomb.
turn.4: It was released on April 19th in Europe and May 7th in the US via AFM Records.
turn.5: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.6: The Terror Tapes was recorded in Dublin, Ireland and Suffolk, UK by Scott Atkins (Cradle of Filth, Stamping Ground) over autumn and winter 2012.
turn.7: Did anyone face any hardships while recording?
turn.8: The band had suffered throat surgery, tendon injury and the loss of original member Luke Graham before recording began.
turn.10: Before signing to AFM lead singer Philly Byrne said "We recorded without a label, did it all the hard way.
turn.11: Did they try any other labels?
turn.12: We’ve spent long enough in the shadows; now we’re ready to re-emerge" The first single, "Terrorscope", was released as a free download on March 26, 2013 and released on limited edition vinyl in April, 2013.
